Alias.name: Ride Horse
Alias.script:
--syntax: rh OR ride xxx
horse = horse or {}
if matches[3] then if matches[4]~=horse.first then horse.first = matches[4] cecho("Horse is set as: <gold>"..matches[4].."<white>.\n") end end
if horse.first then send("ride "..horse.first) else cecho("<red>Horse not set!\n") end
